description: This file defines a data access object (DAO) interface for interacting with 'notes' in a Room database, providing methods for CRUD operations and querying notes.

classes.name: NoteDao
classes.description: Interface defining database operations for 'notes', including retrieval, insertion, deletion, and search.

methods.name: getAllNotes
methods.description: Retrieves all notes ordered by most recent first.

methods.name: upsert
methods.description: Inserts or updates a note, replacing on conflict.

methods.name: getNoteById
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its unique ID.

methods.name: searchNotes
methods.description: Searches notes by a query string matching title or content.
